mapper.insert: insert into serve (SER_ID, SER_SE_ID, SER_CUS_ID, SER_CREATER_NAME, SER_CREATER_DATE, SER_REQUEST, SER_ALLOT_NAME, SER_ALLOT_DATE, SER_HANDLE, SER_HANDLE_NAME, SER_RESULT, SER_SATISFCING, SER_RESUME, SER_STATE, SER_CREATER_ID, SER_ALLOT_ID, SER_HANDLE_ID, SER_HANDLE_DATE ) values (#{serId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serSeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serCusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serCreaterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serCreaterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serAllotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serAllotDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serHandleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serSatisfcing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serCreaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serAllotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serHandleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serHandleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update serve
SER_SE_ID = #{serSeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SER_CUS_ID = #{serCusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SER_CREATER_NAME = #{serCreaterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_CREATER_DATE = #{serCreaterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SER_REQUEST = #{serRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_ALLOT_NAME = #{serAllotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_ALLOT_DATE = #{serAllotDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SER_HANDLE = #{serHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_HANDLE_NAME = #{serHandleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_RESULT = #{serResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_SATISFCING = #{serSatisfcing,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SER_RESUME = #{serResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SER_STATE = #{serState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SER_CREATER_ID = #{serCreaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SER_ALLOT_ID = #{serAllotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SER_HANDLE_ID = #{serHandleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SER_HANDLE_DATE = #{serHandleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SER_ID = #{serId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update serve set SER_SE_ID = #{serSeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SER_CUS_ID = #{serCusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SER_CREATER_NAME = #{serCreaterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_CREATER_DATE = #{serCreaterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SER_REQUEST = #{serRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_ALLOT_NAME = #{serAllotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_ALLOT_DATE = #{serAllotDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SER_HANDLE = #{serHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_HANDLE_NAME = #{serHandleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_RESULT = #{serResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_SATISFCING = #{serSatisfcing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SER_RESUME = #{serResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SER_STATE = #{serState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SER_CREATER_ID = #{serCreaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SER_ALLOT_ID = #{serAllotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SER_HANDLE_ID = #{serHandleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SER_HANDLE_DATE = #{serHandleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SER_ID = #{serId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM serve
SER_SE_ID LIKE "%"#{serSeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}"%"
and SER_CUS_ID LIKE "%"#{serCusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}"%"
and SER_CREATER_NAME LIKE "%"#{serCreaterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_CREATER_DATE LIKE "%"#{serCreaterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}"%"
and SER_REQUEST LIKE "%"#{serRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_ALLOT_NAME LIKE "%"#{serAllotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_ALLOT_DATE LIKE "%"#{serAllotDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}"%"
and SER_HANDLE LIKE "%"#{serHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_HANDLE_NAME LIKE "%"#{serHandleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_RESULT LIKE "%"#{serResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_SATISFCING LIKE "%"#{serSatisfcing,jdbcType=INTEGER}"%"
and SER_RESUME LIKE "%"#{serResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and SER_STATE = #{serState,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and SER_CREATER_ID LIKE "%"#{serCreaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}"%"
and SER_ALLOT_ID LIKE "%"#{serAllotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}"%"
and SER_HANDLE_ID LIKE "%"#{serHandleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}"%"
and SER_HANDLE_DATE LIKE "%"#{serHandleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}"%"
